nodes.text: Trillot was a female/male X'Ting from Ord Cestus who was recently an employee of Cestus Cybernetics until he began his criminal ascent for the local Tenloss syndicate during the Clone Wars.

During the Bio-Droid crisis in 22 BBY, Trillot was selling in information to the Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, but unbeknownst to Kenobi, the X'Ting was also passing information to Commander and Dark Acolyte Asajj Ventress. After the mission of Ord Cestus, Trillot was murdered by Ventress failing to search for a fatal access.
